mapper.select: SELECT department_key as departmentKey, department_name as departmentName FROM department

SELECT dep.id, dep.department_key AS departmentKey, dep.department_name AS departmentName, ui1.nickname AS principal, ui2.nickname AS supervisor FROM `department` AS dep INNER JOIN user_info AS ui1 ON dep.principal = ui1.id INNER JOIN user_info AS ui2 ON dep.supervisor = ui2.id WHERE dep.department_name LIKE "%"#{departmentName}"%"
SELECT department_key as departmentKey, department_name as departmentName, principal, supervisor FROM department WHERE department_name = #{departmentName}

SELECT dep.id, dep.department_key AS departmentKey, dep.department_name AS departmentName, ui1.nickname AS principal, ui2.nickname AS supervisor FROM `department` AS dep INNER JOIN user_info AS ui1 ON dep.principal = ui1.id INNER JOIN user_info AS ui2 ON dep.supervisor = ui2.id
SELECT id, principal, supervisor FROM `department` ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0,6
